info.name: Baileys Elite WhatsApp API
info.description: Complete WhatsApp Web API using baileys-elite with messaging and interactive features.

request.description: Check if the API server is running and WhatsApp connection status
Get detailed WhatsApp connection status
Get QR code for WhatsApp Web authentication
Request a pairing code for phone number authentication
Logout from WhatsApp Web
Get current logged-in user info including business JID for catalog messages
Send a text message. Set 'ai' to true to show AI icon.
Send a text message with AI icon
Send media files (image, video, audio, document)
Send sticker message
Send voice note (PTT - Push to Talk)

item.name: Interactive Messages

request.description: Send text button message as per documentation
Send button message with image header as per documentation
Send button message with video header as per documentation
Send advanced interactive message exactly as per baileys-elite documentation
Send rich media interactive message with image exactly as per baileys-elite documentation
Send rich media interactive message with video exactly as per baileys-elite documentation

item.description: Interactive messaging with buttons and rich features - separate endpoints for each type

item.name: Complex Messages

request.description: Send bulk messages to multiple recipients with delay control
Send a contact card with vCard format

body.raw:
{
  "to": "923007309179",
  "latitude": "37.7749",
  "longitude": "-122.4194",
  "name": "San Francisco",
  "address": "San Francisco, CA, USA",
  "quoted": null
}

request.description: Send location coordinates with optional name and address
Send reaction emoji to a specific message
Send rich business card with interactive contact buttons

body.raw:
{
  "to": "923007309179",
  "title": "Our Featured Products",
  "footer": "Select a product to view details",
  "products": [
    {
      "id": "smartphone_pro_001",
      "name": "Smartphone Pro",
      "price": "699",
      "currency": "USD",
      "description": "Latest flagship smartphone with advanced features",
      "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1511707171634-5f897ff02aa9?w=400",
      "url": "https://myshop.com/products/smartphone-pro"
    }
  ],
  "businessOwnerJid": "923317482772@s.whatsapp.net",
  "quoted": null
}

request.description: Send rich media product catalog with images, pricing and interactive buttons. Single product = rich media card, Multiple products = interactive list.
Send multiple images/videos in a single grouped album message (max 10 items)

body.raw:
{
  "to": "923007309179",
  "documentUrl": "https://example.com/document.pdf",
  "fileName": "Important_Document.pdf",
  "caption": "üìÑ Please review this important document",
  "mimetype": "application/pdf",
  "quoted": null
}

request.description: Send document from URL (PDF, DOC, DOCX, etc.)
Send document by uploading file (PDF, DOC, DOCX, etc.)

body.raw:
{
  "to": "923007309179",
  "invoiceUrl": "https://example.com/invoice-12345.pdf",
  "invoiceNumber": "INV-2024-001",
  "customerName": "John Doe",
  "amount": "299.99",
  "currency": "USD",
  "quoted": null
}

request.description: Send formatted invoice from URL with customer details
Send formatted invoice by uploading PDF file with customer details
Send interactive survey/poll with multiple choice options

item.description: Advanced messaging features including bulk, business templates, and interactive content
